name: French A1 - Sophie's Parisian Journey
description: Follow Sophie, an American professional, as she moves to Paris and navigates her new life in France. Learn French through her authentic experiences - from her first day in the city to making friends, finding an apartment, and discovering Parisian culture. Master essential greetings, daily conversations, and practical vocabulary through engaging stories and interactive exercises.
objectives: Introduce yourself and greet others in various situations
Handle practical situations: hotels, restaurants, shopping
Ask for and give directions in French
Talk about daily routines and hobbies
Describe family, friends, and personal relationships
Use numbers for prices, dates, and time
Understand and respond to simple questions about personal details
